code_value: ets_th1 What do you usually do after supper?</br>ets_th2 You look nice with that new blouse today. It goes well with your skirt.</br>ets_th3 Which do you like better, poems or short stories?</br>ets_th4 I’d like to visit the Art Museum this Saturday. Would you like to join me?
ets_th1 What do you usually do after supper?
ets_th2 You look nice with that new blouse today. It goes well with your skirt.
ets_th3 Which do you like better, poems or short stories?
ets_th4 I’d like to visit the Art Museum this Saturday. Would you like to join me?
